Amity University Gurugram Highlights 2025

Amity University Gurugram is a private university, located in Haryana and was established in 2010. It is a part of the Amity Group with campuses in India and abroad. The university has been accredited with an A Grade by NAAC and is also a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). Amity Gurugram, through 16 schools of study and colleges, offers UG, PG, PhD, and other courses to students across the Engineering, Management, Law, Design, and other streams.

Amity University Haryana courses are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Business School and Programme, ACBSP, USA, ASIC, UK, Indian Nursing Council, Council of Architecture, Rehabilitation Council of India, and IET. Further, the Amity University Gurgaon courses are approved by UGC, the Bar Council of India, and the Pharmacy Council of India. Some of the popular courses offered at Amity Gurugram are BTech, BSc, BA, BBA, BPharm, BA LLB, BOPTM, BCA, MSc, MBA, MTech, MCA, and many more.

The university has a sprawling campus of over 110 acres near Gurgaon with a 20-acre sports complex with a Tennis Court, Cricket Field, Football Ground, Basketball court, etc. In addition to this, the Amity GGN campus has 20 interdisciplinary research centers and more than 200 hi-tech labs. Apart from this, the university has signed MoUs with various universities and organisations, including the University of Cincinnati, The University of Queensland, the Russian New University, etc. The major highlights of Amity University Gurugram are tabulated below:

Commonly asked questions
On Highlights

Q:   Can I get direct admission in Amity University Gurgaon?

A: 

Yes, Amity Gurugram provides direct admission to candidates fufiling the below-mentioned criteria:

  • Candidates must pass Class 12 (CBSE/ ISC/ State Boards) with at least 80% aggregate for direct admission to UG courses. Aspirants eligible for direct admission get exemption from the entrance exam. Selection will be only on the basis of Amity Application Form
  • Aspirants with at least 70 percentile in CAT/ MAT exam are eligible for direct admission to MBA course. Such candidates are exempted from entrance test and can directly come for GDPI round.
  • Direct Admission will be offered to BA LLB, B.A. LL.B. (Hons), B.B.A. LL.B. (Hons) and BCom LL.B. (Hons) based on CLAT score of 90 and above, subject to meeting the Minimum Eligibility Criteria prescribed for the programme.

NOTE: 1. Direct Admission based on Class 12% is not applicable for the programmes of Architecture / Design / Education/ Fine Arts / Fashion / Law and Physical Education.

2. Direct Admission is not applicable for Post Graduate programs

Q:   Is it worth pursuing BTech at Amity University Gurgaon?

A: 

Yes, it is worth pursuing BTech at Amity University Gurgaon as the university has been accredited with an A Grade by NAAC and is also a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). The university offers a BTech programme to students at the UG level for a duration of 4 years with fees ranging between INR 8.2 Lacs and INR 18 lakh. Amity University BTech course is offered to students across several specialisations such as Computer Science & Engineering, Aerospace Engineering, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Biotechnology, etc. Apart from this, the university has signed MoUs with various universities and organisations, including the Deakin University, York University, Dublin City University, The University of Toledo, etc.

Amity University Gurugram Admission Process and Important Dates 2025

Amity University Gurugram admissions 2025-26 are open to all UG and PG courses. The university offers a wide range of programmes to students at UG, PG, and doctoral levels. Amity University Manesar offers BTech, BCA, BA, BCom, BPharm, BBA, MBA, MTech, MSc, MCA, and other courses.

Amity University Gurugram course admissions 2025 are based on entrance exam or merit-based as per respective courses. The university accepts national-level entrance exams such as NATA, JEE, AMCAT, CUET, etc. To get admitted to Amity GGN, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria set by the college. Further, candidates seeking admission to the BTech programme must be Class 12 passed with a 60% aggregate with PCM/PCB. Detailed information regarding the Amity University GGN admission process is given below:

Amity University Gurugram Application Process 2025

Amity University Haryana application process 2025 is both online and offline. The common application form for all the programmes is available on the official website of the University at www.iujharkhand.edu.in. The mode of application is online and the application fee is INR 1,100. Check below the steps to apply for Amity Gurugram admission:

Step 1.1: Visit the official website, www.amity.edu/gurugram/.

Step 1.2: Under 'Admission', select 'UG-PG' and Click on 'Apply Now'.

Step 1.3: Fill out the application form.

Step 1.4: Upload requisite documents.

Step 1.5: Pay the application fee and submit the form.
